name: Dipalo Tsa Motheo
description: Dipalo Tsa Motheo: Interactive number learning game for children aged 4-10. Metshameko ya go ithuta dipalo go bana ba dingwaga tse 4-10. Practice handwriting and basic arithmetic with fun quizzes and engaging activities. Tokafatsa bokgoni jwa ngwana wa gago mo dipalong ka Dipalo Tsa Motheo.
author: K.T Motshoana
